scripts.dev: npm exec concurrently -- --kill-others-on-fail -n "frontend,backend" -c "blue,green" "npm run frontend" "npm run backend"
scripts.backend: cd Backend && (python -m uvicorn main:app --reload --port 8000 || py -m uvicorn main:app --reload --port 8000)
scripts.install:backend: python -m pip install -r Backend/requirements.txt || py -m pip install -r Backend/requirements.txt
